          <title>

          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Comprensión de un texto narrativo y análisis de algunos de sus elementos (personajes, estructura, narrador y tipo de relato).</string>
            <string language="en">Comprehension of a narrative text and analysis of some of the elements (characters, structure, narrator and type of story).</string>

            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Narrative texts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Argumento</string>

          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen eines erzählenden Textes und der 
Analyse von einigen der Elemente (Zeichen, Struktur, Erzähler und Typ
der Geschichte).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension d'un texte et d'une analyse 
narratifs de certains des éléments (caractères, structure, 
narrateur et type d'histoire).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão de um texto e de uma análise 
narrativos de alguns dos elementos (caráteres, estrutura, narrator e 
tipo de história).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione di un testo e di un'analisi 
narrativi di alcuni degli elementi (caratteri, struttura, narrator e 
tipo di storia).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση ενός αφηγηματικών κειμένου και μιας 
ανάλυσης μερικά από τα στοιχεία (χαρακτήρες, δομή, αφηγητής και
τύπος ιστορίας).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
